query:
ALTER TABLE reviews 
  ADD COLUMN userName VARCHAR(100) AFTER userId,
  ADD COLUMN comment TEXT AFTER title,
  ADD COLUMN ipAddress VARCHAR(45) AFTER comment,
  ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(255) AFTER ipAddress,
  ADD COLUMN isVerified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER location,
  MODIFY COLUMN userId INT NULL;
